titles.title: A resolution to authorize the production of records by the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/25/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the chairman and ranking minority member of the Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs to provide to the Department of Justice records of testimony and exhibits received by the Committee in its investigation of management problems at the National Archives and Records Administration, except for materials for which a privilege should be asserted.
